edu.sjsu.cmpe275.api.controller.interfaces

Interface IEmployerAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmployerAPIController

    public interface IEmployerAPI
    Employer API interface, defines request mapping for the Employer routes
    Author:
    nirbhaykekre

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employer> createEmployer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String street, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String state, java.lang.String zip, java.lang.String format)
      This method creates an employer entry.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employer> deleteEmployer(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String format)
      This method deletes an employer corresponding to the ID provided.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employer> getEmployer(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String format)
      This method looks-up an employer corresponding to the ID provided.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employer> updateEmployer(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String street, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String state, java.lang.String zip, java.lang.String format)
      This method will edit an employer corresponding to the ID provided.

    • Method Detail

      • getEmployer

        @RequestMapping(value="/employer/{id}",
                produces={"application/json","application/xml"},
                method=GET)
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employer> getEmployer(@PathVariable(value="id",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="format",defaultValue="json",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String format)
        This method looks-up an employer corresponding to the ID provided. returns 404 if no such employer exists.
        Parameters:
        id: - employer-id of the employer to be fetched.
        format: - JSON/XML

      • deleteEmployer

        @RequestMapping(value="/employer/{id}",
                produces={"application/json","application/xml"},
                method=DELETE)
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employer> deleteEmployer(@PathVariable(value="id",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="format",defaultValue="json",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String format)
        This method deletes an employer corresponding to the ID provided. returns 404 if no employer corresponding to the ID is found. returns 400 if the employer has any employees.
        Parameters:
        id: - employer-id of the employer to be deleted.
        format: - JSON/XML

      • createEmployer

        @RequestMapping(value="/employer",
                produces={"application/json","application/xml"},
                method=POST)
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employer> createEmployer(@RequestParam(value="name",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="description",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="street",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String street,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="city",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String city,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="state",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String state,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="zip",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String zip,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="format",defaultValue="json",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String format)
        This method creates an employer entry. returns 400 if an employer with the same name already exists. returns 400 if employer's name is not mentioned in the query.
        Parameters:
        name: - Name of the employer.
        description: - Details related to a particular employer.
        street: - street on which the employer is present.
        city: - city on which the employer is present.
        state: - state on which the employer is present.
        zip: - ZIP code of the employer.
        format: - JSON/XML

      • updateEmployer

        @RequestMapping(value="/employer/{id}",
                produces={"application/json","application/xml"},
                method=PUT)
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Employer> updateEmployer(@PathVariable(value="id",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="name",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="description",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="street",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String street,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="city",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String city,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="state",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String state,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="zip",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String zip,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="format",defaultValue="json",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String format)
        This method will edit an employer corresponding to the ID provided. returns 404 if an employer corresponding to the ID is not found. returns 400 if name provided is not unique or belongs to another employer. returns 400 if the name is not provided in the query.
        Parameters:
        id: - ID of the employer to be edited.
        name: - Name of the employer.
        description: - Details related to a particular employer.
        street: - street on which the employer is present.
        city: - city on which the employer is present.
        state: - state on which the employer is present.
        zip: - ZIP code of the employer.
        format: - JSON/XML
